mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IM_Customer(IC_No, IC_email, IC_name, IC_password, IC_hp, IC_birthday, IC_address) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(IC_No)+1, 1) FROM IM_Customer), #{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{hp}, #{birthday}, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT IC_No No, IC_email email, IC_name name, IC_password password, IC_hp hp, IC_birthday birthday, IC_address address, IC_regdate regdate, IC_show show FROM IM_Customer ORDER BY IC_No ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IM_Customer WHERE IC_email=#{email} and IC_password=#{password} and IC_show ='y'
